Title: Relates to enacting the worker healthcare protection act
Summary: Relates to enacting the worker healthcare protection act, for New Yorkers who lose health care coverage from an employer or a joint labor management trust as a result of an active strike, lockout, or other labor dispute.
LawCode: Add ยง268-i, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to enacting the worker health care protection act
